name: library
description: - A web libray where you can add books(title, author, pages, read or unread) to the form and it will display it as cards.   - A project of The Odin Project   - check out the Live Preview: https://khunhour.github.io/library/ # Build With   - HTML5   - CSS   - Javascript # Functionality   - able to add books info and it will display as card   - can toggle read & unread button   - can edit existing card and update them   - can delete entire book or card   - form pops up   - show total books statistics # Functionality that are not yet fixed or have   - a log in feature where you can see existing books enter earlier(using JSON, local storage)
